Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Corner lot at a signalized intersection

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located across from University Hospital and is highly visible along Pearl Road. It is less than 10 minutes to SouthPark Mall and other major retailers.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This property offers an excellent opportunity for retail, restaurant, service or office uses. Pearl Road is the main north-south thoroughfare through Strongsville with nearly 12,000 vehicles passing the site per day.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Pearl Road has high traffic counts of 20,214 VPD (ODOT-2019)
The market has a population of 138,612 people and a daytime population of 130,493 within a 5 mile radius
The market has an average household income of $95,797 within a 10 minute drive time
Neighboring retailers include: Costco, Target, Macy’s, Kohls, Dick’s Sporting Goods, TJ Maxx & more!

Neighboring restaurants include: Don’s Pomeroy House, Jersey Mike’s, KFC, Marco’s Pizza, Freddy’s Frozen Custard & Steakburgers, T.G.I. Friday’s, City Barbecue, Outback Steakhouse, Panera Bread, Applebee’s Grill & Bar, LongHorn Steakhouse, Macoroni Grill, Red Lobster & more!
